title: Allow BrokerWithDynamicConfiguration to publish results
body:
As explained in #181, this should be possible.

This is my first time interacting with this codebase, so please let me know if there’s anything wrong with what I’ve implemented here and/or if there are other ways to check for regressions than `cargo test`.

title: [Snyk] Security upgrade alpine from latest to 3.15
body:
Keeping your Docker base image up-to-date means you’ll benefit from security fixes in the latest version of your chosen image. #### Changes included in this PR - rust/pact_mock_server_cli/Dockerfile We recommend upgrading to `alpine:3.15`, as this image has only 0 known vulnerabilities. To do this, merge this pull request, then verify your application still works as expected. Some of the most important vulnerabilities in your base image include: | Severity | Issue | Exploit Maturity | | :------: | :---- | :--------------- | | ![low severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/l.png "low severity") | CVE-2022-0778

title: fix: xml response matching rules
body:
Matching rules were incorrectly being serialised to the request body matching rules section.

See also https://pact-foundation.slack.com/archives/C9VBGLUM9/p1646804259107749.
